SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.socket.server

Class GameServer

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.network.socket.server.GameServer
All Implemented Interfaces:
GameServer, Remote
public class GameServer extends Object implements GameServer
This class represents the game server in the network communication via socket. It is responsible for managing game sessions and handling client connections.

  • Method Details

    • startServer

      public void startServer()
      Starts the server. It listens for incoming client connections and creates a new ClientHandler for each client.

    • createNewSession

      public GameControllerRemote createNewSession(String gameId, String username, int desiredPlayers, GameObserver observer) throws RemoteException
      Creates a new game session with the specified parameters.
      Specified by:
      createNewSession in interface GameServer
      Parameters:
      gameId - the ID of the game session
      username - the username of the client
      desiredPlayers - the desired number of players in the game session
      observer - the observer to be notified of game events
      Returns:
      the game controller for the new game session
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if there is a problem with the remote method invocation
